text: The Okanagan (),. also called the Okanagan Valley and sometimes as the Okanagan Country, is an area in British Columbia, Canada, that is located around Okanagan Lake and the Okanagan River. It is part of the Okanagan Country, which is also in the United States as Okanogan Country Washington. The region's population is 403,950 in 2021. The largest city is Kelowna. == References == Category:Valleys Category:Geography of British Columbia Category:Interior of British Columbia
title: Okanagan
